Entries.1{{YearRemainder}}: Start of a new month, @! What are you planning on getting done?
Entries.3{{YearRemainder}}: @, I got a new commission! I'm so excited.$h#$b#They're looking for a nice large landscape scene.
Entries.5{{YearRemainder}}: When I need inspiration, I take walks through the forest.#$b#I love living out here, so much inspiration so close to us.$h
Entries.7{{YearRemainder}}: I've got a little kitchen in my studio but honestly it's not much.#$b#There's so much fresh food to be found in the forest though! I love fresh salads.
Entries.9: I moved here just before you did. Needed to get away from the big city...
Entries.9_2: My, @, we've been living in this town for quite a while, right?

Entries.movieTheater: Heard that a movie theater's coming to town!$h#$e$To be honest, movies are certainly something I've missed.
Entries.{{TaxDay}}: Nothing sucks more than having to figure out what I did last year so I can file my taxes.$s
